channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How K-Pop Demon Hunters Star EJAE Topped the Charts
item.description: Kids everywhere know her voice—if not her name. WIRED talks to the former SM trainee about her rise to global superstardom with her hit song “Golden.”

item.title: IntrCity SmartBus lands $30M at $140M valuation to deepen its grip on India’s intercity travel market
item.description: IntrCity SmartBus grew revenue by 67% last year and is targeting full profitability this year, as intercity travel booms across India.

item.title: Federal Workers Are Barely Making It Through the Government Shutdown
item.description: The US government shut down 30 days ago. WIRED spoke with more than a dozen federal workers who have struggled to pay bills, worked side gigs, and rel...

item.title: Cluely’s Roy Lee on the ragebait strategy for startup marketing
item.description: Cluely's Roy Lee has a message for startup founders: you should be thinking harder about how to go viral.

item.title: NBA champion Tristan Thompson and World Mobile launch community-owned network Uplift
item.description: With Uplift, every subscription will contribute to neighborhood-level network expansion, while local hosts that are known as "AirNode operators" will ...

item.title: Digg founder Kevin Rose on the need for trusted social communities in the AI era
item.description: Now again under Rose's control, the new Digg is creating a place for people to socialize and connect online within communities, similar to Reddit, but...

item.title: Newegg Promo Code: 10% Off in November 2025
item.description: Enjoy up to 10% off your entire order with today’s Newegg discount code and save with the latest deals for gaming PCs, laptops, and computer parts.

item.title: Lenovo Coupon Codes and Deals: $5,000+ Off

item.title: India’s Snabbit valuation doubled to $180M in 5 months on its quick house-help bet
item.description: Snabbit has raised its third funding round in nine months.

item.title: KitchenAid Promo Code: 25% Off in November 2025
item.description: Save on every purchase with top KitchenAid coupons from WIRED, including up to 25% off countertop appliances.
